all_reviews.review_title: Really exciting product and excellent customer support so far
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
The platform itself is undoubtedly one of the most intuitive tools I've used during my career. The ability to build complex segmentation quickly and efficiently is especially beneficial, and I'm enjoying exploring the capabilities of building sophisticated customer journeys via the Canvas workflows. Our onboarding experience was positive, with detailed guidance on best practices and easy-to-follow steps, while the customer support has been prompt and informative.

What do you dislike about Braze?
An area of improvement needs to be in the reporting tools to visualize the conversion events and engagement rates. The HTML editor also needs some work to make it more seamless, from changing code to viewing the previews.

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
For those who need a solution for mobile marketing or a mix of web/mobile, I would highly recommend Braze. The onboarding process was supported excellently by an Onboarding Manager and had regular meet-ups to discuss progress and next actions. Not always easy tackling big tech projects like this in a start-up, but Braze did their best to take us through step by step. The platform is user-friendly and can be understood very quickly regardless of your previous experience with this or other CRM tools. We're still only scratching the surface of what is capable in Braze, but we're very excited to see how this partnership grows!

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
As a business, we are scaling very quickly, and Braze is supporting us in building a customer journey that delivers our values across all marketing channels and touchpoints. From onboarding to retention and loyalty, it's allowing us to personalise customers' experiences based on their behaviours and needs. The ability to deliver complex journeys across different channels in a simple step-by-step process allows us to test, learn and scale quickly, which is fantastic for a business such as ours!

all_reviews.review_content:

I love the extensive functionality Braze offers for mobile and web users. The ability to in-app, in-browser message has been such a game changer for us for communicating to our end users.

What do you dislike about Braze?
I personally would love to be able to make lists (similar to how Hubspot has it) in Braze the equivalent is segments which have been a little frustrating when it comes to reporting.

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
I have Ease of set up as a 4 because in order for Braze to work at its fullest potential you need to set it up properly. THANKFULLY they have an amazing support team and Account reps that will walk you through everything

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
The benefit started with our Apps. We were able to set up the app with Braze to completely run/nurture on its own. From onboarding emails, empty cart notifications, subscriptions reminders it was all set up to be triggered and send on its own. For our web-based products, we replaced a lot of email with in-app messaging. We knew the users were in the product and were able to get our message front and center.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Braze:
review_question_answers.answer: I have Ease of set up as a 4 because in order for Braze to work at its fullest potential you need to set it up properly. THANKFULLY they have an amazing support team and Account reps that will walk you through everything

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: The benefit started with our Apps. We were able to set up the app with Braze to completely run/nurture on its own. From onboarding emails, empty cart notifications, subscriptions reminders it was all set up to be triggered and send on its own. For our web-based products, we replaced a lot of email with in-app messaging. We knew the users were in the product and were able to get our message front and center.

all_reviews.review_title: Great app focused CRM system
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
- Canvases are a great workflow tool enabling you to map out complex and multi-channel campaigns to drive customers to a certain goal
- The integration with an app, allowing for strong visual led prompts and CTAs
- Email templates can be built using the in-platform drag-and-drop editor or uploaded as an HTML file
- Fairly simple and straightforward campaign tool used to send one off campaigns
- Easy process to create internal seed and testing groups
- Sandbox testing environment for trying things out without affecting the live version of Braze
- Very informative and interactive learning courses within the platform allowing you to get to grips with the different aspects of the platform
- Tagging system is helpful to highlight and separate different campaigns, templates and canvases i.e operational/marketing comms
- Account managers are very knowledgeable and always trying to push your thought process out the box to create more meaningful and impactful campaigns

What do you dislike about Braze?
- Canvas steps going all over the place if you try to add additional steps partway through a workflow
- No duplicate filter option when creating segments/targeting for campaigns and canvases

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
If you need a CRM system that ties in well with a mobile app then Braze is certainly worth considering

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
- Allowing the team to create highly targeted, personalised customer journeys
- The amount of data available means we can drill down and create niche campaigns
- Driving more people to download the app and then keeping them active users

all_reviews.review_title: Robust and powerful data streaming and activation platform. Excellent for message personalisation.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Rapid product feature release and view into the product roadmap. Beta features are introduced after sessions and inputs from existing clients.

Easy to use and reliable event streaming and activation platform with good stability. Message personalization is on par with other leaders in the industry.

What do you dislike about Braze?
Lacks some advanced customization functionality on the ingestion and classification layer like transformation/ mapping of data from raw data source.
The only option to ingest data from non-sdk sources is from the APIs. No out-of-the-box ETL/RETL exists within the product to pull data from external sources.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Known and anonymous user engagement with multiple channels via robust and personalized journeys. External integrations via webhooks are easy and can push data into most external systems.

- Very informative and interactive learning courses

- Great Customer support, account managers are very knowledgeable and always working to up your CRM game

What do you dislike about Braze?
- No comprehensive analytics and Data Visualization features covering not only CRM KPIs but business KPIs over multiple campaigns, journeys, time periods etc.

-  Interface can get slow. Longer journeys take time to load and change.

-  No support for WhatsApp yet

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Implementation of 360 strategies by deploying multi-channel journeys via Braze. This has led to better user engagement, conversion and retention.

all_reviews.review_title: The Best CRM platform for Mobile Applications
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze has all the essential resources that Marketing and Product teams need for a quick, easy, and professional user engagement and conversion. Once all the technical setup is done, it becomes an amazing tool for segmentation, automation, and testing. Product Managers and Marketing professionals will be entirely independent of any Data Analysts or Developers for a best in class app communication. Furthermore, it enables powerful and easy tests through InAPPs and Content Cards that will avoid your company losing time coding some features before knowing they will work.

What do you dislike about Braze?
The only thing I miss is a more complete set of Analytics and Data Visualization features. There are better tools for visualizing user segments, cohorts, and LTVs. However, Braze's product roadmap evolves quickly and I see them aiming at what is more important: features for better campaigns, segmentation, tracking, and automation. Therefore, the best solution is to bring Amplitude and Braze together, both the best Analytics and CRM tools for mobile applications.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have achieved great lifts on purchases (5%) and app usage (+20%) month after month through journeys (cart abandonment, onboarding, activation, reactivation) and campaigns on Braze.

What do you dislike about Braze?

all_reviews.review_title: Hugely scalable, always evolving, omni-channel, comprehensive marketing platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Powerful, cutting edge system with a logical approach, intuitive design, very adaptive/customisable, ease to integrate 3rd parties and build/deploy campaigns/canvas. Great tools: Liquid, webhooks, content blocks, connected content, segments etc. Amazing feedback process, always evolving and improving current/releasing new features.

What do you dislike about Braze?
FTP storage URL addresses cant be customised
Built-in email templates are not great
Some limitations within canvas that do not occur within campaigns
Built-in reporting tools are limited
On a few occasions, solutions required the creation of additional (billable) data points within Braze when it shouldn't have been required.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Liquid & webhooks solve most problems I encounter in Braze and are extremely powerful and allow, for e.g. personalisation, conditional formating, automated processes and the creation of new data custom attributes/events without the need for engineering support.

all_reviews.review_title: Braze is the best esp I've used!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
personalization capabilities, weather-based targeting, ease of use, support team, cost savings and omni-channel approach. After working with competitor ESP's (Fishbowl/Personica, Emma, Klaviyo) we were blown away with how much smoother our marketing campaigns were for both set up and deployment!

What do you dislike about Braze?
Nothing I can think of! It would be cool to be able to create creative assets inside of braze with ability to link assets within braze so we don't have to use movable ink.

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
Look at integration capabilities from your other sources -- and seriously consider if your other sources don't connect to Braze -- why not? I have had 0 issues with Braze.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
local store capabilities, analytics dashboard, liquid logic making personalization a breeze! We are more productive -- we can set up campaigns easier on the fly!

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent support, timely replies, nicely thought through software
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
I enjoy dealing with the support team. they are polite, knowledgeable and get back to be quickly, even for issues with low priority. I also like working with Braze, it makes the CRM creation process fun and engaging.

What do you dislike about Braze?
Some product features are missing - such as local currencies in revenue reports. I also would like the campaign report a bit more customisable - campaign reports are good, however aggregating reports across campaigns need to be exported via a flat file (perhaps link to a viz tool)

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
I would recomment to give it a try. Users will soon realise how engaging it is

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
At this point, we are building email campaigns and have been using campaigns and canvas. This is fun. To set up a campaign is fast and preview is nicely clear too. We also use campaign reporting.

all_reviews.review_title: A platform with great support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
The training documents have been extremely helpful for new users to get up to speed and become familiar with the platform. Also, the support team has been amazing a quickly and thoroughly responding to questions we have.

What do you dislike about Braze?
Not everything can be viewed easy all within the Braze platform. Most items require having a connection to a third-party app or pulling data out of the system via API for analysis. This isn't necessarily a bad thing but can make it difficult to manage multiple vendors and have to go into multiple systems to get a complete picture.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
We've been able to build complicated user journeys across multiple channels to be able to reach our customers where they would like to be contacted.

all_reviews.review_title: I was in charge for some email campaign for B2B segment, I used a lot the drag and drop template
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
I really liked the ease of switching beetwen mobile and desktop view when creating the email using drag and drop editor. Also liked the ease of creating many variants of a template when launching a campaign.

What do you dislike about Braze?
I noticed that often some elements used in drag and drop editor freezed. The most unpleasent situation it usually presents when duplicating rows and triyng to edit images size: sometimes i can go straight to a certain % sometimes no. Anyway i found a solution to these problems by deleting the row with problems and creating it again from 0.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
I can finally control the conversion of email campaign that before were totally unknown. Also I can better asses which communication tone or expressions can better perform in order to optimize the convertion itself, amazing!

all_reviews.review_title: Braze at Burger King South Africa
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Being able to communicate with users specifically by personalization, but a step further with the ability to also communicate in line with behaviors ensuring greater relevance in our communications

What do you dislike about Braze?
It was challenging having to transition into the new tech and the capabilities of Braze. so no real dissatisfaction withBraze but it can be overwhelming to deal with a huge wave of information and having to put plans into place from there.

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
Have clear goals that you want to achieve and how Braze can help you achieve them. try to get the entire business aware of the solutions capabilities so they understand the purpose of it, even if they're not working with it.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Improved communications and greater user engagement, leading to growth in users and addressing inactive users and understanding user behaviours through their interactions

all_reviews.review_content:

Very easy to use and navigate braze for campaign building. Canvas functionality has proven to be especially beneficial as we are testing into campaign building efficiencies.

What do you dislike about Braze?

all_reviews.review_title: Great tool and amazing team for support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
I love the fact that its so easy to use appeals to all levels. Whether your a first time user or a full on coder. Its also very intuitive to navigate unlike some of their other competitors.

What do you dislike about Braze?
There a few things that could be improved i.e. Ability to change conversions after you set a campaign live. A drag and drop email builder would be a great feature where you can create the draggable blocks.

The product road map is pretty decent and is constantly being worked on so not a lot in terms of dislike.

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
Get your app developers and Engineers on board as without their support you will find it difficult to do the more meatier stuff. Also if you have a complex data model that changes a user profile or hell of a lot data invest in getting your internal Apis sorted.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Custom in app messages. We have implemented a beta version so it gives us ability to manage one-to-many relationships for our customers. Still early on but i can see a lot of companies that may benefit from it.

all_reviews.review_title: Powerful CRM tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze is a platform that is really useful especially when it comes to looking at the data. We were able to integrate Braze data into Looker while it has never been possible with Salesforce Marketing Cloud. I also like the custom events and properties features which allow understand customer behaviors and send them relevant communications.

What do you dislike about Braze?
The documentation is not always very detailed. When we wanted to implement new custom events linked to Google Tag Manager, we had to figure it out ourselves which was quite frustrating.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
As a Marketing Analyst, I can really see a difference when analyzing CRM activities within Braze (as opposed to SFMC). Thanks to the numerous features available, we can really understand what is working and what is not.

What do you dislike about Braze?

If you're looking for a platform that excels at multi-channel customer engagement, is relatively easy to implement and onboarding is solid, then I highly recommend Braze. The platform doesn't try to be everything under the one roof, rather, it does one thing exceptionally well, and that is customer engagement.

Braze has helped us ditch disparate platforms that were difficult to sync together and roll out a unified multi-channel marketing platform with sales and coupon tracking capability.

all_reviews.review_title: Complex omni channel CRM campaigns with little to no technical experience required
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Simplicity of sending a trigger based communication with a simple user firendly interface. I can trigger a camapign when a user performs an action without having to get a developer or a speciailist involved. I can also integrated external APIs via connected content without any special talent or resources.

What do you dislike about Braze?
Limitations of accessing external data and storing it in Braze. E.g. persistent event properities. Another dislike is that it is a web-based tool. Long loading times on VPN and processing requirement for Chrome to run the platform.

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
There is a learning curve, but the community is very knowledgeable and has readily available solutions.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Biggest problem is having an omni channel experience (in-app, SMS, push, email) all in one journey. Benefits realized is the ability to track user experience and leverage tags to ensure that users are to receive the intended experiences.

all_reviews.review_title: Game-changer for boosting engagement & retention
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze has been a game-changer for helping us boost app usage and overall engagement.

Some of my favorite things about the Braze platform include:

- The team. From sales to onboarding and ongoing support - all of the teams I've dealt with at Braze have been truly professional and top-notch. Some of the best in the industry!
- Canvas. It's straightforward to set up full multichannel campaigns - in-app, push, and email - with different variations, flows.
- Drag & drop email editor - this is a recent improvement that my team and I have enjoyed.
- Easy of campaign set up - Like Canvas, it's easy to set up campaigns and measure/evaluate their performance.

What do you dislike about Braze?
There are not many things to dislike about the platform. There are some quirks - such as not duplicating templates across different environments and previewing custom HTML in-app messages. Overall though, these are minor annoyances that don't impact my experience with Braze day to day.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
The major problem that Braze has helped my team solve is user retention and production. Before implementing Braze, while we had a solid registration rate, app usage beyond that was challenging. The Braze SDK has changed this for us! We've seen usage increase exponentially, and we're now exceeding our KPIs by a long shot compared to a couple of years ago.

all_reviews.review_title: Great CRM tool, great service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
How user-friendly it is. Even if you don't have a technical background, you can engage with your users through different channels. Braze keeps improving the product, adding more and more capabilities. It has excellent Customer Service ready to jump and help.

What do you dislike about Braze?
Reporting and analytics could be better. It has improved by adding the retention reports and canvas analysis, but if you need to pull out data, it can get a bit messy, and it's because they will try and get you to complement your subscription with Amplitude / Looker.

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
It's a great tool that I would definitely recommend for any type and size of the company. It keeps improving and adding more features, it's easy to use for Marketing Managers, and all are well-documented for integration, training, tech support. Customer Service is quick to respond, and if you have a Customer Success Manager, they will go up and beyond to help you increase business.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
CRM management for our Products (3), increasing LTV and user retention. Onboarding purposes and ad-hoc campaigns (newsletters, service messages, promotions and marketing campaigns). Emails / In-Apps / Push Notifications.

all_reviews.review_title: Braze always has your back!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
I can't put enough emphasis on how helpful the Braze support team has been throughout my journey to learn Braze. Each time I've reach out with questions they've been fast to reply, polite and very professional in how they've approached my questions. Through my interactions with these amazing people I've learned how to self-diagnos many of the complex events I encounter when attempting to build a sofisticated canvas. My biggest thanks to the support team and specifically our success manager Noam who keeps pushing and supporting me to evolve with Braze.

What do you dislike about Braze?
I do miss a better way to visualize content in a canvas. It would be amazing to just hoover over a step and see the content within the specific step.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
With Canvas we can build very advanced flows of communication which also makes it possible to create a sophisticated multichannel communication strategy. The report builder / funnel reports are also great for seeing results from campaigns/canvas.

all_reviews.review_content:

Braze helps us to be closer to our clients in various ways which is essential in a startup. The support team is amazing and helpful and the account managers are truly working towards the same goal as you - they want you to succeed. The various messaging channels and data that Braze provides help us build global messaging and promotional campaigns with ease.

What do you dislike about Braze?
Some logic decisions and exceptions in Canvases could be improved.

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
Braze gives you all the possibilities to be vocal with your users, segment your users, see how your users react and act accordingly. You can automate all of your communications and make even the hardest automations possible with the help of your engineering team. Creating specific reports and measuring conversion events is also really easy. You always have room to improve, test and improvise. If you're running out of ideas don't worry because your account manager is there for you and gives you a lot of new tactics and ideas to further increase your efficiency.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are successfully communicating with every user out there with sophisticated messaging whether it's an active user, an inactive user, a not converted user or just someone browsing - Braze allows us to communicate with them efficiently and easily.

- Customer support & client success
-  Reliability
- Integrations
- Amazing product roadmap + always coming up with new features
- Some basic AI/ML features (intelligent timing, intelligent channel selection, churn models etc.)

What do you dislike about Braze?

- Real-time data management

all_reviews.review_title: Superior multi-channel orchestration platform for engaging customers at scale
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
It is by far one of the most sophisticated and comprehensive platforms for orchestrating multiple customer engagement channels at scale. Build over an easy orchestration and A/B testing framework, it is a must-have for any organisation with multiple customer touchpoints and CRM channels.

What do you dislike about Braze?
There is a definite scalability issue to leverage out-of-the-box solutions on email & in-app templates. These cannot be fully customized without product and engineering support.

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
It is critical to get early buy-in from engineering and product teams in order to drive the scalability and adoption of Braze.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Since customer journeys are not linear, we use Braze as our customer engagement platform to engage customers across channels, such as email, in-app, push & content cards.

Most of our campaigns are testing something - either a subject line, best time to send etc, which enables us to drive a continuous uplift across all our lifecycle programs.

all_reviews.review_title: Infinite possibilites
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
What I like the most about Braze is the infinite range of possibilities it provides thanks to its data fields. Personalization is now key for success and Braze provides all the elements to enrich your campaigns and tailor them according to the user's needs and specificities.

What do you dislike about Braze?
The thing I like the least about Braze is maybe the visual organization in the segments and campaigns tab. Even though the tags help categorize our campaigns, I feel like the workspace is messy and that I'm losing time finding what I'm looking for. Also the categorization into "archived", "active", "stopped", "drafts" etc. sometimes is more an obstacle than an advantage. Finally, I don't like not being able to delete campaigns or segments. I feel like that would help in making the workspace cleaner.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
A major problem with a previous tool was speed and efficiency. It now takes no time to set up and launch a campaign. The benefits are infinite, but a deeper personalization is definitely the number one on the list.

all_reviews.review_title: Braze, next level CRM tool for marketers
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze gives everyone a chance to create impactful campaigns for the customers. It is very user-friendly, and even if you are a first-time user of a CRM tool, you can make anything from one-shot campaigns to multiple-step canvas in different channels, decision splits, and webhooks.

Braze helps accompany the user through the customer journey. You can set up as many sets of communications as you want for each life cycle stage: Activation (onboarding), Retention (loyalty and frequency), and Reengagement (churn). Plus, it gives marketing teams autonomy to create their segmentation and personalization without depending on other departments.

Moreover, every month Braze launches new features that improve the capability of the tool. From intelligent channels and timings (so you can target the users in their most engaged channel at the right time) to survey in-apps and audience paths (which allows sending each user communications based on their behavior).

It is also worth mentioning that the support team is excellent. Whenever I have a question, an issue, or an idea, the support team responds quickly.

What do you dislike about Braze?
There are two downsides to Braze: First, reporting is poor compared to the rest of the capabilities. It is not user-friendly and lacks organization to drive insightful conversations. Second, once the canvas is live, if there is a last-minute change, you might not be able to increase the proportion of the control group or apply some changes on the channel steps.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Braze has allowed us to build a robust strategy for each one of the stages of the user. So instead of having different communications and no tracking of what the user needs, Braze has helped us have coherence and be more efficient.

Lastly, thanks to Braze we have been able to increase our number of new customers. Nowadays, the penetration of new customers thanks to CRM has reached more than 5% in some markets.

all_reviews.review_title: One of the best automation software out there with a great team.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Support
Braze has the best customer support system I have worked with to date. They are open to taking feedback from clients and very agile with suggestions we give them. The customer success managers go out of their way to give advice and keep you up to date with their product road map.

User Friendly
The system is very user friendly. I like the fact that our business can be agile to execute multiple campaigns very quickly and develop complex user journeys very easy

Constantly growing
I picked up how quickly they are growing and introducing new features regularly that allow us to stay ahead of the curve. As mentioned before, they are very open to feedback, and it feels like you help them help you, and it creates a perfect working relationship. The numerous achievements they have accomplished in a short time show you that they have a good team in place and make us feel comfortable.

Feature Rich
The multitude of features available in Braze allows for vibrant automated campaigns and enables us to run A/B tests and increase our reach to customers quickly. The features they have available is innovative and very valuable if used correctly.

What do you dislike about Braze?
Email delivery through a third party can sometimes feel like they do not always have control over email issues. Still, generally, the response is rapid, and we have not had any significant problems.

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
Marketing, Data & Analytics, and Engineering needs to work close together when implementing and then the different areas will have more/less responsibility once live.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
We found that using Braze and the feature they call canvas reduces manual work. With the rich automation available, you can set up a range of features that can produce excellent value for the business.

The numerous achievements they have accomplished in a short time show you that they have a good team in place and make us feel comfortable.

Feature Rich
The multitude of features available in Braze allows for vibrant automated campaigns and enables us to run A/B tests and increase our reach to customers quickly. The features they have available is innovative and very valuable if used correctly.

Braze has so many different and unique capabilities. Delivery options, targeting options, and data storage capabilities are robust and don't leave a ton to be desired. It's not often that I tell a coworker, "we can't do that", when we are planning a campaign with Braze. If it's not directly built into the dashboard, there are usually ways to use the data and the capabilities that are there to reach your goal. They are very receptive to product feedback as well.

What do you dislike about Braze?
Downside would be there is a large learning curve to get to Braze mastery.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Braze allows us to send and test messages without the support of engineering or product. While we still need their help to get brand new data into Braze, once we have that data we can operate autonomously, which allows our marketing team to work at a much faster pace.

all_reviews.review_title: Game-changer for marketing teams
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze allows teams to build deep expertise around one tool and enables marketing teams to own the full end-to-end campaign cycle across all owned channels.

What do you dislike about Braze?
Braze is an amazing tool if you go "all-in". If you're just using it to build generic, simple, single-channel campaigns, then it's likely not worth the price tag. But, if you're willing to learn how to use the various personalization features and want to truly own a cross-channel strategy, it's well worth the cost.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Braze has allowed our marketing team to build, test, iterate, and scale campaigns autonomously, without requiring ongoing engineering help. Now we're able to launch multi-channel campaigns that are hyper-personalized, measure variant performance, and iterate all within one tool. We're able to ship things faster and create more 1:1 experiences, all while meeting the user where they are.

all_reviews.review_title: Great Service for Marketing Communication
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze is a very easy service to integrate with. Also, it's not hard at all to train persons from different company areas (Marketing, BI, etc).

One thing that we value is the evolution on the service documentation and UI. Since we started to use it, their portal really evolved and the documentation got so much better. It's now way easier to find something on their docs.

Also, Braze is always up to date with each platform updates, they are great communicating when a SDK has to be updated in order to be align with new platform constraints (iOS / Android).

What do you dislike about Braze?
It was very hard, in the beginning, to integrate with the In App notification feature. The documentation was not helpful and, after a while, we were able to figure out, with the help of Braze's team, that it behaves differently on Google Play Android devices vs Amazon Android devices.

Also, it was hard to find some help from Braze's support in the begin, but this got better after a while. They really improved their support area.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
It made our life easier to create marketing campaigns that we can use to target users on Mobile Devices, E-mail campaigns, our web apps, etc.

The other problem we were able to solve was training Marketing and Data guys into multiple different tools. With Braze's very intuitive UI, we can easily train them and get rid of many other Marketing tools.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy to use interface for creating complex customer journeys
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze is simple to use, with great results. Setting up campaigns and canvases take very little time as most fields are self-explanatory. They are constantly working to improve their services and offer training to help you get started. They have an awesome customer support team that will take the time to explain how to use the great tools they have to create seamless customer experiences.

What do you dislike about Braze?
As the business model is built around data usage, it's easy to be left without historical data or simple data you could find in a more traditional ESP/CRM without adding more packages. Sometimes it can be difficult to understand the way the logic works for more in-depth projects, but the more experience you have with it the easier it becomes.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Braze helps us to create unique customer journeys based on the actions of our customers. It gives us the opportunity to build these out in much more detail than we were able to before, and monitor our automation or make quick adjustments with much more ease. The more you use the tools it offers, the more imaginative and creative you can be with making sure your customers are being sent the right content at the right time. Even though we currently use it just for email, it also gives us the opportunity to grow across different forms of media and maintain the same seamless customer journey, and exciting prospect for the years to come.

all_reviews.review_title: I found Braze easy to learn and advance but a bit challenging to master.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze LAB, without a doubt. This is something I have enjoyed and it helped me learn the product and improve my Marketing Ops skills. And the best part, it's not only for beginners and super helpful just to go back and refresh your knowledge.

What do you dislike about Braze?
I really think that the Canvas building process can be simpler or better visualized. I don't have a direct recommendation on how to do this, but sometimes when building a complex user journey, it can get confusing for both the builders and those looking at the finished product.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Basically, we are reaching out to every registered customer through Braze and it has helped us by allowing us to use braze on 3 different channels: Email, Push, and InApp. It's super useful to be able to use one tool for all relevant channels and to be able to create multi-channel content.

all_reviews.review_title: Powerful engagement platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze is a powerful all-in-one platform for email, push notifications, in-app messaging, SMS, web push, web messaging, and content cards. Braze has been a great partner, listening to feedback and taking product recommendations back to the appropriate teams. We've had great success using Braze. It has introduced many features that have helped our team's ability to scale new products and engage our user base. Braze has great personalization tools such as Liquid Logic, Connected Content, and webhooks that allow us to create unique, one-to-one journeys for our users that drive clear impact.

What do you dislike about Braze?
Braze is quite expensive, as you have to pay for data point consumption. Once you've reached a level of sophistication with your attributes, events, and general scale, you are paying a lot to maintain and consume data required for developing engagement programs through Braze. Braze could improve upon its reporting capabilities as well as Canvas. The engagement report tool is clunky and difficult to use. Canvas is a great journey tool in theory, but there are many nuances with it that make it difficult to use. The team also recently implemented SMS as a new channel. As one of the first Braze customers to do so, the road to implementation was quite rocky. Braze could improve upon their onboarding processes for new products and features.

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
Make sure to investigate deeply what features you would leverage, and forecast clearly any associated costs to attributes, events, and other data points you would need to be successful with Braze as each data point consumed is a cost.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Braze allows the team to create relationships with our users and keep them engaged. We have the ability to trigger a variety of communication types after key actions or behaviors without our product to nurture every stage of the lifecycle and funnel. Braze has powerful personalization features that improve overall campaign performance. Braze is also a key element to our ability to launch and scale new products or features.

all_reviews.review_title: Braze proves to be a powerful tool after using for a year

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Total Customer Experience, Digital Business Group

all_reviews.review_title: Push, Email, In-app, Personalization, Geolocation all in one platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
The canvas feature allow for a very seamless set up for user journeys and the interface is user friendly. I love that we can intertwine push, in-app and email all within a canvas. This allows us to message our users in the channels they find most valuable.

The support team at Braze has been incredible helpful and useful. The success managers are not only a great source for strategy, but they also have valuable technical skills to help push projects along. This has made getting higher level projects completed much easier when we haven't needed to constantly consult with technical engineers for answers.

Braze is constantly evolving and always wiling to add us to beta testing so we can utilize and understand new tools before available to everyone.

What do you dislike about Braze?
I wish there was a more comprehensive dashboard that could assess metrics in a little more depth. I would also love to see an analysis on potential passive churn.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
With canvas, it's much easier for us to visualize journey's and assess which messaging could be overlapping within a user flow. Being able to send a subsequent push after a user takes certain actions within a different channel, like email, has been valuable and enhanced the user experience.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Braze?
review_question_answers.answer:
The canvas feature allow for a very seamless set up for user journeys and the interface is user friendly. I love that we can intertwine push, in-app and email all within a canvas. This allows us to message our users in the channels they find most valuable.

The support team at Braze has been incredible helpful and useful. The success managers are not only a great source for strategy, but they also have valuable technical skills to help push projects along. This has made getting higher level projects completed much easier when we haven't needed to constantly consult with technical engineers for answers.

Braze is constantly evolving and always wiling to add us to beta testing so we can utilize and understand new tools before available to everyone.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Braze?
review_question_answers.answer: I wish there was a more comprehensive dashboard that could assess metrics in a little more depth. I would also love to see an analysis on potential passive churn.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: With canvas, it's much easier for us to visualize journey's and assess which messaging could be overlapping within a user flow. Being able to send a subsequent push after a user takes certain actions within a different channel, like email, has been valuable and enhanced the user experience.

all_reviews.review_title: Possibilities are endless
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
- User-friendly.

It is easy to see and edit all the automated canvas journeys we have running, as well as all of our campaigns. When using it for the first few weeks, I quickly found it fairly simple and straightforward to use. I also think it's great when it comes to managing multiple campaigns at the same time.

- Online LAB courses

The online videos and courses are really helpful, especially when it came to using the tool at the beginning stages. I still reference them today when needed.

- Support

The support team are very helpful and always provide feedback, suggestions, and workarounds when coming across potential barriers.

What do you dislike about Braze?
I think there could be more detailed reporting and analytics built within Braze.

Something minor, but sometimes when dragging and dropping steps in a canvas it can feel laggy.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Having any kind of automation was difficult in the past, so being able to build automated canvas journeys such as onboarding and lapsed journeys has benefited us greatly.

A problem we are hopefully about to solve is having all of our communications in Braze. We are about to integrate emails into Braze, which is going to enable us to be more sophisticated with our cross channel approach.

all_reviews.review_title: Extremely powerful and easy to use once setup correctly
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
The segmentation and personalization tools are extremely robust, but still easy to use, which is a combination that is hard to find in the marketing tool world. I found myself and our Email Marketing Manager being pleasantly surprised throughout our onboarding process when trying to do a task with a few clicks when in our previous email tool would require data analyst help.

What do you dislike about Braze?
This isn't really a problem with Braze itself, but in order to get to a place where usability is described as above, we iterated on our event process and attribution mapping many times. We had a team of engineers that worked on the implementation without input from the marketing and product side of the equation, so some of the setup was not usable from an end-user perspective. Again, totally on us but we are still seeing residual effects pop up in terms of the issues with our initial implementation.

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
Braze is an important piece of our engagement marketing efforts, it is a great and easy tool to use.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
We run all of our customer communications through Braze. From onboarding to upsell campaigns, we are utilizing our event stream with Braze via Segment to create user journeys that are based on activity (or lack there of)  vs time, which allows us to create more sophisticated and data driven journeys.

all_reviews.review_title: Poweful Tool
all_reviews.review_content:

- The possibility to use multi-channel messaging in a single campaign set-up.
- Endless possibilities for template customizations.
- The Customer Support is awesome.

What do you dislike about Braze?
It's more a frustration than a dislike: It's not possible to bulk import multiple custom attributes into an audience, usually i need to insert them 1 by 1.

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
If your CRM platform is giving you headache, i recommend you to test Braze.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
We increased the overall  messaging engagement and are not able to use automated multi channel campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: Supportive team coupled with strong product
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
--Support when needed, the team is always there to assist in building out campaigns and canvases from ideation to implementation. The team is always accessible and responds quickly.
--Ability to build out custom attributes for even more personalization.
--Flexibility to send messaging in various forms to communicate effectively to users
--Online LAB courses are great resources and easily accessible for beginners.

What do you dislike about Braze?
I haven't found something that I have disliked in my current scope since working on Braze and with the Braze team.

I have been able to gain a better understanding of what our subscribers are interested in reading and coordinating with our internal content team to better serve our readers. I have also been able to successfully prove engagement with our newsletter and other content integrations.

all_reviews.review_title: Braze is Wonderful
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze is incredibly versatile and has some of the most dedicated representatives I've ever worked with. They are always willing to help you figure out issues, and connect you with engineers when you need more advanced questions answered.

Moreover, their system is built in such a versatile away that it allows marketers to do virtually whatever they want.

What do you dislike about Braze?
I wish that the Braze segmentation loaded a bit faster--sometimes it's easier to download a list than it is to preview it.

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
Speak to sales representatives--they are super knowledgable and very helpful.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Braze is solving so many problems for us that it is hard to pinpoint exactly one thing that is invaluable. Our marketing team would not be able to function without Braze--there would be no product markets without Braze.

all_reviews.review_title: Great product with a great team
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
-User friendly: If you are experienced with ESPs, Braze is simple and straightforward to learn after an initial exploration into the tool.

-Tooling, Products, and Features: Braze is a robust tool that enables my team to build complex lifecycle marketing programs without needing support from product/engineering. We can easily target users with email, push notifications, in-app messages, webhooks, SMS, and more all in one place.
If there is ever a product that is missing/could be improved, the Braze team will listen to our needs and incorporate suggestions into their product roadmap.

-Customer Service: The Customer Success team is so responsive and helpful - some of the best I've ever worked with. They will provide suggestions, feedback, workarounds (if needed), and recommendations to improve your efficiency and strategy. I'd highly recommend a CSM as well.

What do you dislike about Braze?
I like to think of it more as areas of opportunity for improvement.

-UI improvements such as foldering/organizational structure instead of just a tagging system.
-Load times for canvases that are very complex (though I've been told this improvement is coming soon)
-Better reporting and analytics built within Braze. We do a lot of exporting of data to outside tools for analysis.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are using Braze to communication with all of our audiences through multiple app groups using email, IAMs, push, SMS, and webhooks.

Braze has enabled our CRM team to build and test robust, personalized, real-time user journeys without ongoing support from product/engineering.

all_reviews.review_title: A modern platform and top-notch support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze has been an amazing partner for our organization as we have worked to mature our product retention strategies and efforts. They are proactive in offering solutions and in helping us to solve problems, when they do arise. They have provided us with a very personal experience which was quite a contrast from processes that felt very bureaucratic with Responsys in the past.

They continue to evolve and improve the range of marketing solutions that they offer in a way that complements our needs. Their approach to dynamic content has worked well for our business needs and has scaled well as we've implemented 1-to-1 personalization, and their tools for building and previewing  messages and audiences is intuitive and easy for a small marketing team to manage.

What do you dislike about Braze?
Moving data into and out of Braze has been a challenge over time., though their Currents product has helped that quite a bit in terms of pulling event data out of the platform.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
We moved to Braze, primarily, for our email marketing efforts. Using their platform we have been able to increase our agility with building targeted messages and with building out a system for personalization of content for each recipient.

We are now looking to expand our use of Braze suite of tools and services to begin introducing similar benefits within our mobile push and in-app retention efforts.

all_reviews.review_title: Amazing product (and the people are great, too!)
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
As a product, Braze is extremely intuitive -- it's easy to figure out how to do what you need to do (and even if you can't find it, all of their learning resources are very well done). The platform is very robust, so it's easy to execute campaigns efficiently and as imagined. We used to send all of our marketing comms from an in-house tool, so upgrading to Braze has been a dream. But the best part is the customer support -- the team answers every question we throw at them, and have supported us through some trickier campaigns.

What do you dislike about Braze?
Honestly -- there's nothing I can think of. Anything we've brought forward to the product team has already been in their pipeline.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're able to reach out to our members more efficiently, and in a more personalized way. We've been able to improve our overall engagement, and are now able to iterate on our messages to continue to improve.

all_reviews.review_title: Tooling integrations are great, but need to target more granular audiences
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Support at Braze is phenomenal at getting into the weeds of debugging issues and stepping into the shoes of our implementation.

What do you dislike about Braze?
There are a few drawbacks we face due to our company's technical implementation of Braze that prevent us from relying on Braze native assets and documentation to educate the company on how to effectively leverage the tool. Apart from the limitations tied to our technical implementation of Braze, we also experience a gap in the tool's usage when it comes to creating very unique audiences that require pairing multiple property combinations to one event that a user may take in any given digital funnel.

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
Know your data. You need to understand what data your company is tracking on digital clients, then you need to analyze that data in a visual report to digest it and understand where users are dropping off in the predefined funnel journeys and where there are opportunities for experimentation.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are nurturing our digital clients at the right time in their digital journey based on our Segment instrumented data tracking a variety of user interactions on webpages and within product experiences. We are also able to analyze all Braze interaction events alongside our every day Segment data in Amplitude analyses.

all_reviews.review_title: Great one-stop shop but difficult to adopt in large company
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze is good at managing multiple campaigns simultaneously. It is easy to draft, start, stop, modify, restart, and archive campaigns -- the interface is attractive and the campaign creation/management process is pretty intuitive. Collaboration is a strong feature although the dashboard can get messy when a large company holds a single account for dozens of different campaigns.

Targeting options are very sophisticated. Braze uses both event and analytics data from our offerings to let us choose the exact cohort we want to hit. Delivery triggers are similar, but depending on instrumentation of the offering our delivery timing may not be optimal. (We rarely get this right on the first pass.)

Braze has built-in analytics charts and statistics. We use them to get quick insights about campaigns, but feed the data into a third-party tool to understand the results in overall business contexts. Smaller shops may not need to do this, but it is essential when comparing and contrasting multiple data sources and analytics generators.

Overall Braze has a lot of functionality and can serve as a one-stop shop for marketing automation, but because I work for a large company we have yet to fully adopt Braze as we have other tools that are better integrated with our existing systems and processes.

What do you dislike about Braze?
One limitation is that once campaigns are launched, Braze does not allow changing conversion events. They do this to maintain data integrity, but in many of our use cases, this does not make sense. However, it is still fairly simple to copy the campaign and then change the conversion event and relaunch. This does mean that we have to sum data to fully see results.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am a demand gen marketer using Braze to nurture marketing prospects exclusively through in-app messages as we use a proprietary marketing automation tool to send emails. Due to the reporting issue stated above, we have yet to prove end-to-end business impact/effectiveness from our Braze campaigns, e.g. our Braze campaigns show strong "conversion" but we have yet to show that trial registrants are converting at a higher rate.

all_reviews.review_title: Simple & easy to use
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
In addition to being easy to being an easy to use platform, I'm in love with their support. I love working with Kevin, one of the most enthusiastic people I've worked with. If it wasn't for their constant check-ins and follow ups, I would be lost.

The segmenting and sending a campaign is quick and easy. The fact that I can do push and email in the same section saves me so much time.

Organization is simple with tags. I can tag my on-going campaigns/newsletters and use those tags for segmenting.

A/B testing is easy to set up and schedule. Previously, I used to use Marketing Cloud and this is much more efficient for what I need.

What do you dislike about Braze?
For simple segmentation, this is perfect. But I'm curious how I can get more granular segmentation. In-product search function needs a bit of work.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
The benefit for me is the simplistic segmenting tool. I send an email and two push notifications daily. I need to be quick and efficient with my time.

Now that I'm more familiar with Braze I churn these out in half the time.

all_reviews.review_title: Extremely useful tool with a great support team.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
That you can personalize and launch messages/campaigns in several channels (i.e. push, in-app, email..) . You can have multiple campaigns going on at once and stay organized using available tools. As a newer user to Braze I cannot say enough about how great the team is. Very responsive and helpful! Last but not least, the help section with its tutorial videos & lessons make it so much easier for a new user to get going.

What do you dislike about Braze?
I wish it was easier to search for campaigns, delete campaigns (not just archive) and have more reporting options (especially in exporting to other programs like excel)

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
It's so much easier to run multiple campaigns at once and in multiple channels. It has also become easier to try various targeting (A/B testing) thanks to the tools.

all_reviews.review_title: Personalization at Scale
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze is extremely powerful and can create almost any customer journey you can imagine.  Once you have connected the right events to their platform, you are able to trigger messages and progressions for any action a customer takes.

What do you dislike about Braze?
There are a few connections within canvas that currently are not present. These are more niche, but it would be nice to have.

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
If you want a powerful CRM platform, then you will be happy with Braze.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Lifecycle Marketing, CRM. We have seen a significant increase in return attendance and retention of our users. We have seen improvements in both new payer engagement and return payer engagement with the platform.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy to Use Tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
I like that Braze is very intuitive and easy to use. I was able to start building mobile push campaigns with ease after only one on-boarding lesson.

What do you dislike about Braze?
I'm new to using Braze, and so far there is one thing that I would like improvement on. I wish the engagement reports could be personalized more, especially in terms of formatting. Currently percentage values show up as decimals on the engagement report and it isn't easy to read.

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
Braze is a very user-friendly and intuitive tool. Support team is great.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
My team and I are working towards personalizing push notifications more. Currently we're doing experiments and tests to find optimal send solutions for push. One feature I found really useful and interesting in Braze is Intelligent Timing. With that said, it would be great if Intelligent Timing could be integrated into Canvas to streamline programs.

all_reviews.review_title: Marketing Manager
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze made it possible for my team to consolidate a multitude of different marketing tools all under one roof. Having legacy communications firing from Marketo, Mandrill, Mailchimp, Intercom, and Localytics, I was able to completely migrate those communications to Braze and have them all work together.

While the product itself is stellar, what makes Braze world-class is the support that comes with it. I've never worked with a team that is so involved in making sure you are set up for success and willingly rises to the occasion when help is needed.

What do you dislike about Braze?
The only area for improvement worth mentioning would be improvements to the UI and building of some campaigns. I have no doubt however that as the company continues to grow, these will all be ironed out in time.

With Braze being a growing team, it's been really inspirational sharing product feedback to Customer Success and Product Managers and actually see this feedback get woven into the product.

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
When looking to upgrade your marketing tools to a 21st century product, Braze is going to get you there.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Cross-channel marketing to ensure top of funnel metrics and drive down-funnel conversion of our core product and up-sell opportunities to nurture users to adopt our mobile banking product. Braze serves as our primary tool for customer retention strategy through the use of automated reengagement campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: Powerful platform with great capabilities!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze platform offers a lot in terms of capabilities for marketers who are looking to grow their push and in-app notifications channel. You can start from building simple push campaigns and go to much more complicated journeys where each step is based on a particular action or activity that a user takes. The interface is pretty intuitive and there are a lot of in depth training documents and materials which help a lot when you are just learning the platform.
Braze also offers the very best in customer service. Our success manager is amazing! She has been very patient and responsive, helping us out from the very start when we were new to the platform.
It's not often when a company is able to offer such a powerful platform/service and a great team of people who are ready and available to help with any challenges.

What do you dislike about Braze?
Reporting is a bit limited, would be great to have more in-depth reporting there, especially an ability to export reporting by device/platform for users in the campaigns.
Starting with the canvas feature can be a little tricky at first and it's definitely a learning process to build a more complicated canvas journey/campaign.

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
Great platform if you are looking to improve your mobile marketing channel!

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are able to use Braze to re-engage our app users via push messaging and in-app communication.
Finally we have can work on creating an onboarding push notifications series to promote our subscription service and app.This is a great platform for us to generate better engagement and promote our brand while improving the retention rate.

all_reviews.review_title: Most user-friendly ESP
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze has a very user-friendly interface, and makes templating, segmenting and campaign setup much easier to navigate than any other ESP I've used (and I've used almost all of them). The conversion tracking is also superior to any other marketing automation platform - it's configured for an e-commerce use case. The Braze onboarding process is very thorough and the team has been available to answer any/all questions we've had in the early implementation/integration phase. The resources available for onboarding, implementation and best practice references are great & easy to access.

What do you dislike about Braze?
We are currently using Braze as an email platform, but the product is primarily built for a mobile push/in-app messaging use case - that being said, there is some functionality on the email product that could be enhanced. There are also some nuances in the data structure that are important to catch when implementing, but if you understand those nuances you can customize the product to fit your needs.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are using Braze to trigger lifecycle and ad hoc campaigns to our 2-sided marketplace audience. So far the product has worked well for us and we're starting to see conversion + revenue growth.

all_reviews.review_title: Highly recommend
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Once we launched our first campaign through Braze, we haven't stopped. It's super easy to get campaigns up and running, set conversion goals, and measure impact. You can communicate with your customers across email, push, in-app, and content card integrations. If you're looking for a customer engagement platform for your app, I'd suggest considering them as a partner. On top of the tool itself, we've found our reps to be fantastic -- always helping us figure out how we can further leverage all the offerings of the tool.

What do you dislike about Braze?
As of now, we tend to measure most of our conversion events using custom events through mParticle. This is not always a robust enough solution, so our Analytics team will often need to do a deep dive to get more detailed results.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
We can't rely on product alone to push users through the funnel. Braze has become a solution for that, and we seen lift against the control for nearly all of our campaigns -- so it's easy to justify the cost of the tool!

all_reviews.review_title: Don't just engage customer, connect
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze enables us to connect with customers directly in-app or on email at the most opportune points and time in their journey based off of usage data and behaviors.  And their canvas allows us to plan, visualize and orchestrate the customer experience from beginning to end.

What do you dislike about Braze?
While Braze can optimize the message medium based on performance, we don't use a lot of the existing capabilities and channels, and need additional tech build outs and workarounds for unique B2B use cases.  I wish we could use some of the underutilized features, when they fit our enterprise needs.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Conversion- increases in ARR
Adoption- more usage and consumption
Retention- cross sells
Churn Reduction- reengagements with early measures

Braze is a super helpful tool. It helped me to create lots of segmentations and give the best experience for all of the different types of users that we have. The good thing it's that you can use the platform to increase almost every metric related to the user life cycle - activation, engagement, conversion, reactivation etc.

What do you dislike about Braze?
I think it would be nice to have even more automated things. For example, we cannot automate newsfeed cards right now, so my team has to set up them manually every week.

Activation, engagement, conversion. We had really good results in terms of our subscription sales. With Braze we were able to send different offers to different users which helped us to, not only increase our revenue but also give the users offers that are more affordable to them.

all_reviews.review_content:

Seamless integration with the rest of our Growth tool stack. Easy to use UI. Excellent support. Braze has a strong mission and is putting out features to back that up.

What do you dislike about Braze?
The search function can be finicky at times, but overall does not impede work. Braze is, however, lacking some of our advanced audience segmentation needs.

We are using Segment instrumented data flowing into Braze to nurture users through in-app and email campaigns. We've been able to drive digital user engagement, paid conversion, adoption, and retention through these campaigns. We also have Braze events flowing into Amplitude to analyze campaign success.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Braze?
review_question_answers.answer: Seamless integration with the rest of our Growth tool stack. Easy to use UI. Excellent support. Braze has a strong mission and is putting out features to back that up.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Braze?
review_question_answers.answer: The search function can be finicky at times, but overall does not impede work. Braze is, however, lacking some of our advanced audience segmentation needs.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: We are using Segment instrumented data flowing into Braze to nurture users through in-app and email campaigns. We've been able to drive digital user engagement, paid conversion, adoption, and retention through these campaigns. We also have Braze events flowing into Amplitude to analyze campaign success.

all_reviews.review_title: I would highly recommend Braze as an ESP.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze is intuitive. The steps to setting up and deploying an email are simple and straight forward so that I am able to focus more so on strategy as a marketer and less time  (frustratingly)  setting up campaigns.

What do you dislike about Braze?
Push open data is overstated and misleading under campaign details because it is calculating open rate off of influenced opens (meaning they are counting an open even if someone closes out of it).

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Being able to setup liquid logic has helped our team considerably by helping personalize messaging based on a user's preferences.

all_reviews.review_title: Braze - In App and eMail Messaging
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Has a powerful and native integration with the segment.
Seamlessly identify events and milestones to interact with clients through email or in-app messages.

What do you dislike about Braze?
Not that I dislike but I see as an opportunity. More flexibility to scale to big organizations (e.g. product codes and families).

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Data without use has no purpose. Braze is helping us create bridges with our users and is allowing us to connect and engage in a powerful way through in-app and e-mail messages that allow us to improve our user experience.

- Having in-app and email messages coming after defined and specific milestones allow us to humanize our applications, supports trust and adoption.
- Better campaign management processes and user impact.

all_reviews.review_title: Powerful customer engagement platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze enables you to get incredibly complex with your customer engagement, leveraging tons of data and real-time events to shape how you engage your customer base.

What do you dislike about Braze?
The implementation is complicated and has big implications on your MAUs and Data points, both of which impact your cost.

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
Make sure you invest the time and resource to implement properly. Push Braze hard throughout the onboarding process to make sure everything is flowing smoothly and properly. Expect to need eng resources after implementation to fix anything new you discover is problematic and add additional data to braze.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Onboarding, activation, and ongoing customer engagement.

all_reviews.review_title: From application developer point of view
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
I've done an Android integration of Braze SDK to our application. What I liked best:
- The SDK itself is well documented
- A comprehensive Platform Integration Guide that gives both the technical information and an accessible feature-guide for a "technical guy" (who may not be involved in all the marketing and analytics tips and tricks)
- A friendly and prompt technical support that is willing to help.

The overall SDK quality is great. It is proofed by both our production application monitoring with many customers and also by our security team audit which didn't find any flaws.




-

What do you dislike about Braze?
From a developer point of view I don't like the Singleton pattern that is the main one used in the SDK.
As we mostly use a DI approach, the Interface/Implementation approach will work better for us and make testing easier.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
With Braze we gave our marketing and analytics team an ability to build CRM campaigns and experiments without efforts from the in-house development teams.

all_reviews.review_title: Braze consistently improves
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze is an extremely robust tool with a short learning curve. Building out new lifecycle strategies and campaigns was extremely simple. While there are a lot of functionalities, no CRM/ESP service will ever have every feature that all of their competitors have. Braze does a great job to meet the needs of their clients onto the roadmap.

What do you dislike about Braze?
Braze's reporting function is still a work in progress. It's getting better but reporting still requires a bit of work. The visual reports are not very helpful, which makes it difficult to track where users are dropping off.

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
Consider the CRM needs of your organization. Braze is a great tool that might cost more upfront but in the long run save you money and time.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are using Braze to speak to all of our audiences across the company. The CRM team is able to build out messaging and inapp experiences without ongoing support from our internal engineering teams.

Having worked with many campaign management tools, Braze is by far the superior in terms of useability. The user interface is built with the end user in mind meaning that users of any background are capable of building and managing campaigns.
I have used Braze for over 4 years, and quite a lot of work goes into product development based on real life use cases which results in always new and improving ways to engage with our audience.

What do you dislike about Braze?
I don't particularly dislike anything about Braze. If anything I would suggest there could be some improvements around the email editor.

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
If you have used other similar tools- you will love the usability of Braze

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Braze has allowed us to grow engagement and usage through a high volume of campaigns with little resourcing.

all_reviews.review_title: Been using Braze for about a year to launch in-app and email campaigns
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
I like that you have control over when and where within the product you want to deliver your campaigns to depending on how granular your product instrumentations are.

What do you dislike about Braze?
If you don't have a solid understanding of your own product's instrumentations and how Braze data works with Segment and your own instrumentations, it will be confusing to navigate the tool initially and how to maximize the effectiveness of Braze's functions.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am using Braze to target specific groups of users based on their activity levels and usage of the product. I also use in-app campaigns to nudge the users to progress within the product and use email campaigns to remind users who received the in-app campaigns but still have not take any action towards it.

all_reviews.review_title: Braze for email and marketing analytics
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze has email, inapp pop-ups, push notifications, and streamlined "paths" called canvases which make the platform very comprehensive and good for medium to enterprise businesses.

What do you dislike about Braze?
There are little quirks that can get annoying, like it won't let you move from step to step while editing a campaign (you have to click through one by one to get through to the final one).

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
Don't be overwhelmed when you first start using the platform. Their customer success department is also very helpful and will be there to guide you and troubleshoot through problems.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
It helps set up all our mobile and desktop marketing needs. It takes a lot of getting used to but after about a month of extensive use, you realize how much of a powerful tool it is.
