all_reviews.review_title: A product with great potential built by a mighty team
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Usability:
Braze platform is easy to learn and quite intuitive. We needed very little training for our user community to start using the platform.

Tools, Utilities and Data:
Braze platform provides some easy to use tools to feed and extract data out of the platform. Detailed event level data available through Currents is also super helpful to feed to our analytics system. Platform has standard reporting and pulled another custom dashboard to meet our needs. This showed their customer centricity.

Product Roadmap:
Braze Customer Success team and their frontline leadership has always been listening to our needs and ready to include features in their roadmap if they are generic enough to be useful to their wider customer base and also suggest ways to get our specific requirements done.

Partnership:
Whenever we need them, they are available. CS team is proactive, Product team is responsive and the leadership team is supportive. I called our CS team many times for suggestion/solution to a problem and always provided a reasonable solution or advice.

What do you dislike about Braze?
I do not agree to the word 'dislike', I believe there are opportunities like any product to improve.
1. Braze now needs to take a leap towards a smarter platform providing integrated capabilities for personalization. A multi-channel consumer product in today's marketplace requires this capability to stand out from the competition.
2. Opportunity to add some low-lift features to provide user convenience. Like, a better (WYSIWYG) templating tool for emails as the email templates are specialized and not everyone may like to maintain this skills in-house. As an email marketing tool, this is kind of table stakes.
3. Optimization/further simplification of their frontend features (I expect to enter the campaign details only once for all channels with the ability to customize if required)
4. Capability of better reporting and analytics in-built to the platform

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are only using the email channel currently. The platform gives us the ability to A/B test easily and measure the outcome.

all_reviews.review_title: Powerful
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze is built for marketers, and can be as simple or as complex as you need it to be. From multiple-step and multiple-channel flows to quick, one-off blasts, it's really what you make of it.

What do you dislike about Braze?
The reporting tools need some work. Creating more in-depth analyses takes a lot of manual work, especially if your team didn't spend extra on Currents or if your data/product team doesn't have time to prioritize building complicated dashboards for you.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Braze to increase engagement and reduce churn of our apps and websites. We're seeing big improvements in both weekly and monthly retention, and are able to experiment quickly with new ideas through Braze.

all_reviews.review_title: Very good product & Reactive team
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
The best CRM product I used so far: allows us to design complex scenarios using push notifications, emails and in-app messages. It is very easy to use and the analytics features give us good insight to constantly improve our campaigns.
The team, especially the account manager, is reactive and brings relevant solutions.

What do you dislike about Braze?
I have serious doubts in some data accuracy shown in Analytic features such as the "Campaign retention" which is in Beta for a long time now.
Canvas feature is useful but the Analytics side is limited.
I'd like to be able to amend the conversion events once the campaigns are launched.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
We constantly try to improve engagement & retention on the free side of our app. We also use campaigns to bring people to convert to our premium features and reduce churn.

all_reviews.review_title: Comprehensive automation and 360 degree customer view
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze has resolved the biggest problem of marketing automation, building a single profile for customer that can be targeted from the channels (email, app push, web push, news feed, web hooks, etc) provided. This gives us the flexibility to do cross-device marketing as well. Apart form this, it's very easy to use and robust (few downtimes). Customer Success team takes your objectives as their personal objectives and strive hard to make them meet.

What do you dislike about Braze?
No solution at the moment to do personalization; Ability to amend / edit purchase events; Absence of GCC office;

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
Although Braze is one of the best tools to work, perform thorough market research before finalizing any vendor.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have been able to increase our CRM revenue by 3x. Thanks to real time marketing automation that we are able to do now. Apart from this, we are using Braze to collect and utilize customer data for other teams. This helps us in better understanding of customer behavior, proper attribution, and better transparency on what is happening.

all_reviews.review_title: Powerful & User-friendly
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
The Canvas technology allows us to build complex funnel in a simple way and to achieve our most complex CRM strategies. We can easily import our own data to have strategies that are using user centric data and activity data. A/B testing on Braze is very easy and useful too. Braze day-to-day support is also amazing.

What do you dislike about Braze?
While the Push notification offer is very complete, the email offer misses a good templating tool to easily build and change email templates.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
With Braze we can easily use our own data mixed with in-app activity data to build our CRM campaigns, it was not possible before with our existing tools. With Braze we increase our volume of active users, and we started our first monetization campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: Come for the platform, stay for the people!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze makes my job as a engagement and growth manager so much easier! I spend way less time on the (historically) hideously time-consuming tasks of mapping out user journeys, setting up campaigns and ensuring guardrails around segmentation. Machine learning means my campaigns and A/B testing are much more efficient. Though I love the tool and find it really intuitive, if I get stuck I can always reach out to the good folks at Braze! They are terrific and patient (which I can attest to first-hand) and they are always there to help me work through my challenges. My contacts at Braze are also terrific sources of ideas and testing that help me get the most out the platform and excel at my job.

What do you dislike about Braze?
The search function makes me crazy and should be fixed immediately because my keyboard is covered in tears.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
At this point we are running tests and tests and more tests - all in an effort to drive engagement across multiple segments. Braze has been a key part of that process, and our early success using CRM.

The success team is very responsive and happy to help if you run into any issue or need help with anything.  In case you are new to the platform they have amazing learning labs. all_reviews.review_title: Powerful product, wonderful team
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze is the leading platform in user engagement automation and for a good reason! I've been working with them for 2+ years - their platform is extremely powerful, volatile, ahead of the curve in terms of technology and it covers all channels that one could need.
No matter your business or technology, you will be able to build extremely customized campaigns with spot-on targeting and timely delivery  - all of which is automated. Technical issues are easy to spot once you understand how you can use the platform's technical logs. Also, it is the perfect product to build user multi-channel complex user journeys.

What do you dislike about Braze?
Nothing really, I would perhaps prefer that product requests from clients would take a bit less time but it is very understandable that they are prioritized according to product plans.

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
Scope out your campaign needs as well as your technical requirements, complexity etc for a smooth integration.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
User re-engagement via push messaging and in-app communication.

all_reviews.review_title: Braze Review
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
segmentation abilities, triggered campaigns, but mostly our account manager Nick. He does an incredible job in helping us through our challenges that we may not initially understand.

What do you dislike about Braze?
reporting is not intuitive, especially for Canvas, where all of our onboarding campaigns live. creating an email can be difficult sometimes when it comes to formatting. don't like that it's not easy to tell when a campaign isnt working the way its supposed to (but i hear that Campaign Threshold Alerts are in the pipeline)

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automated messaging!! Makes all of our lifes easier. We've been using Canvas for our onboarding, but we just recently started using them for running national campaigns with a longer timeline and its great to set it up one week and not have to worry about it again for a month.

all_reviews.review_title: Functional and Easy to Use
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Braze is extremely intuitive, which is very refreshing after working with a couple of other marketing platforms in my career.

What do you dislike about Braze?
The analytics is not very robust, but being that it is a relatively new product, I am sure there is more to come as the Braze team takes feedback very well.

Recommendations to others considering Braze:
This is a great product. It's very easy to use. I have even trained non-marketers in my organization to use it and they are surprised by how easy it is to use for their non-marketing campaigns.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Building out multi-variant campaigns and testing at a quicker pace. It's very easy to launch new tests, without having to spend a lot of time getting it together.

all_reviews.review_title: Braze has been good.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
Out of the 4 esps i've used, braze has been the most reliable so far.  I don't have to worry about segment uploading issues or sending issues. The UI is very pretty and friendly to easy. By far one of the easiest UI to understand. I like all the options braze gives, such as adding a seed list and frequency capping.

What do you dislike about Braze?
I'm never 100% sure if the data is accurate. I haven't ran into many issues yet. We've only been using it for a couple of months. So far, so good though.

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are trying to figure out how to target and segment users through a/b tests. I like frequency capping because it helps us miminize how often we target a specific user.

Increase company KPIs thanks to the segmented & personalised communication.

all_reviews.review_title: Appboy for the win
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Braze?
- Constantly adding new features / improving the dashboard
- Reliable (very few bugs, downtime)
- Super easy to create campaigns on the fly
- Super easy integration with our backend systems (API triggered campaigns, Connected Content)
- Super easy language handling
- Responsive and helpful support team
- Really easy to A/B test

What do you dislike about Braze?
- Synchronization between production and staging accounts difficult
- Customised splashes tricky to deal with
- Could have done with more handholding when it came to warming the marketing email IP

What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
Solves our primary problem of dynamic, relevant, reliable and regular communication with our users with flying colours.

- Customised splashes tricky to deal with
- Could have done with more handholding when it came to warming the marketing email IP

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Braze solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Solves our primary problem of dynamic, relevant, reliable and regular communication with our users with flying colours.
